page.title: 09EDUCATION CREATIVE WRITING
page.content: {MY PET DRAGON}(Part 2) At midnight I got dressed, went downstairs and walked out of the house. I looked in some bushes and there was the dragon all curled up in a ball. I picked it up and started to carry it home. Suddenly I heard someone or something say, "Where are you taking me?" I looked round but there was no-one there, so I knew it was the little dragon. I took it home but the next thing I knew, it just disappeared and I started to cry. Then the dragon suddenly re-appeared and explained why it had to go; because it was only a dream dragon. Then it disappeared into thin air and I never saw it again.
